name: weatherapp-group-9
description: This project is a basic weather application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to input the name of a city, fetches the current temperature and weather condition from the OpenWeatherMap API(https://openweathermap.org/api), and displays the information on the screen. The app also includes error handling to manage cases where the entered city is not found or the API request fails.
author: Group 9
